function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on deposit banking and food service industries","Impact":"Business closures, financial distress, loss of revenue","Mitigation":"Implementing effective response measures, adapting to new normal, finding alternative means of service","Technologies":"Digital banking platforms, online food delivery, contactless payment systems","People":"Employees, customers, business owners, stakeholders","Owner":"Government, business owners, management teams"},{"Description":"Strategic uncertainty and severe financial distress for firms","Impact":"Inability to respond effectively, disadvantage in the market","Mitigation":"Acting quickly and strategically, adapting to shorter timeframes, implementing rapid response strategies","Technologies":"Strategic management tools, agile business practices, rapid response technologies","People":"Business owners, management teams, stakeholders","Owner":"Business owners, management teams, strategic planners"}]}
